en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each [Extended Move Time] awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 沈着のアレキサンドライト
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の操作時間延長の覚醒数に応じて 攻撃力が上昇。（操作時間延長＋は2個分で加算）

kr_skill.name: 침착의 알렉산드라이트
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 조작시간 연장의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승 (조작시간 연장+는 2개로 계산)

na_skill.name: Alexandrite of Calmness
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Extend Time] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns (Extend Time+ counts as 2)
